item.description:
LIVE  Tele-class with Dawn Cartwright!!!

SIGN UP HERE:  http://eepurl.com/mwJjj


Be Fully Alive Boston Tantra Immersion Preview:  Sex, Love & Awakening On the Tantric Path

Dawn Cartwright is a Tantric visionary, sacred writer, world traveler, and innovator in bio-energetic Tantra fusion. She discovered the path of Tantra by accident shortly after a period of life-changing mystical experiences in lovemaking. During her 20 years of teaching, she has integrated the Vigyan Bhairav roots of Tantra, Alexander Lowen’s teachings, the wisdom of Osho, and a microcosm-macrocosm approach to the body. Founder of the Chandra Bindu Tantra Institute in Santa Monica, California, Dawn is dedicated to the realization of human potential through the direct experience of reality.

Dawn received her degree in psychology from the University of California, Davis, and has had extensive training in Tantra, Yoga, Bioenergetics, Meditation, and Expressionistic Movement & Art. She has studied many schools of Tantra including Neo-Tantra, Kashmirian Shivaic Tantrism, Tantric Kriya Yoga and the Vigyan Bhairav Tantra. Dawn has had the honor of receiving these transmissions from some of the most acclaimed Tantric masters of modern times, Margo Anand, Daniel Odier, Bohdi Avinasha, and Osho.

You’re invited to join Dawn Cartwright LIVE Tuesday, June 12th, for this dynamic experiential preview of the Be Fully Alive Tantra Immersion - coming to Boston, July 20th-22nd.

Sign up here:  http://eepurl.com/mwJjj

Love!  Robyn and Dawn

P.S. If by chance you cannot be on the call live, it will be recorded.  So please sign up anyway and you'll receive the recording within 24 hours.
Chandra Bindu Tantra Institute
www.chandrabindutantrainstitute.com
310.592.1293
item.name: LIVE Tele-class with Dawn Cartwright: Sex, Love & Awakening On the Tantric Path
